member.name: IMAPI_BURN_VERIFICATION_LEVEL
member.summary: Defines values for the burn verification implemented by the interface.

member.name: IMAPI_BURN_VERIFICATION_LEVEL.IMAPI_BURN_VERIFICATION_FULL
member.summary: This verification compares the checksum to the referenced stream for either the last session or each track. A full verification includes the heuristic checks of a quick verification for both burn formats.
